name: The Only Star in the Sky
name_original: The Only Star in the Sky
description:
A kinetic novel written in BASIC for the 2021 Global Game Jam.

Story

A star is the only one of his kind in the sky, and he must know why.

Credits

Conceptualization, Story, Programming
Benedict “Moonlight Bomber” Villariaza
